title: Sports Sales Intern - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Sales Intern Posted/Updated: 10-11-2015 Brief Job Description: You would be working with sports teams and organizations across the country selling them game programs, media guides, pocket schedules etc...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
